Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory261.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{2: 'I was very clear in my report.', 3: '9'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'A comprehensive data camouflage... How is that possible?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "We aren't sure. We can only guess that Huaxu is capable of such power.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "That doesn't make sense. If Huaxu is capable of this degree of data camouflage, then 'she' could have just...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Asimov stops talking mid-sentence on the comms.'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I warned you not to forget that possibility.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "You were right. I'll get going.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{2: "What's happening?", 3: '27'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "We'll clarify later. Right now, you have a more urgent mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Catch Bianca... I mean, Huaxu?', 3: '29'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Since Huaxu took the initiative to appear before us, we obviously can't let this opportunity slip out of our grasp.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'No matter where "she" goes, Huaxu will eventually find a way to complete the core objective... Or return to the mother terminal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I see. In short, as long as we can find the location of that program, we can find hints on where to proceed from there.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{3: 'A few days ago.'}
{3: 'Holding the cold coffee, Murray got up to leave the conference room before bumping into Celica, who opened the door.'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Did President Hassen forget to explain something?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Celica blankly handed Murray an ID card.'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Commander Nikola asked me to give this to you. Otherwise, I wouldn't be talking to you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "As for your mission... I don't want to get involved.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'With that, Celica turned and left the conference room.'}
{3: 'Murray looked down to confirm the logo on the ID card and gave a wry smile.'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: '"Ouroborus", "Scarab", "Cerberus", and "Caribou"... Which of the black ops teams would be the Commander\'s backup plan?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'As for me... How much do you know about me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Looks like... I have the upper hand with the information I know right now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'This will eat into some of my resources, but this risk... is worth taking.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Playing around with the ID card in his hand, Murray opened the door and left the conference room.'}
{3: 'After he left, the only light that remained in the room was the quiet blinking from the bug in the holo-projector.'}
